name: Let's Break The Tetris
description:
Ever considered who pick next tetramino in TETRIS? Now it's time for you to make players life harder. Let's break the Tetris.

To Play Tetris

Move TetraminoA, DRotate TetraminoWAccelerateSpacebar

To Break Tetris

In draw window draw tetramino you want to release and than press release button. You cannot draw the same tetramino in a row.

If player managed to complete a row, in next move you can use more tiles to build pentamino or even hexamino.

You win when player reaches the end line.
